segments.text: I see the woman standing at the sink, completely unaware of the water overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s just polishing that plate like nothing’s wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is already pooling around her feet, and she doesn’t even notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’ll slip and fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being so sneaky behind her back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is practically hanging off that stool to reach the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s like no one in this kitchen is paying attention to what’s happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how careless this whole scene is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is going to ruin the cabinets if someone doesn’t turn it off soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think I’d be yelling at everyone by now.
segments.speaker: PAR
